SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM( real_price ) realPrice, SUM( recharge_amount ) rechargeAmount, COUNT( order_id ) orderNumber FROM czb_direct_charging_order WHERE `state` != 0 AND `state` != 3
AND record_type = 1
AND (record_type = 2 OR record_type = 3)
) AS fnd1 JOIN ( SELECT SUM( real_price ) todayRealPrice, SUM( recharge_amount ) todayRechargeAmount, COUNT( order_id ) todayOrderNumber FROM czb_direct_charging_order WHERE `state` != 0 AND `state` != 3 AND TO_DAYS( create_at ) - TO_DAYS( NOW()) = 0
AND record_type = 1
AND (record_type = 2 OR record_type = 3)
) AS fnd2
